document.full_text: miami heat coach erik spoelstra described thursday's dramatic 95-93 defeat to the dallas mavericks in game two of the nba finals as one of the toughest losses he has had to endure.
document.title: erik spoelstra vows heat will rebound from late slump
lines_and_colors: miami heat coach erik spoelstra described thursday's dramatic 95-93 defeat to the dallas mavericks in game two of the nba finals as one of the toughest losses he has had to endure.
